title: Behavior, bugs, and more in Ask Riot

replies.body: Your summs are there to use, just because someone used them both to get a kill out of you, doesn't make it an even trade.

That depends on what happens after the fact, if them burning both summs to kill you means they dont have them up for the massive game-changing teamfight that happens 60sec later then its huge, early game it can be even bigger as burning both summs leaves you wide open for ganks over and over and over until they are back up

question, I just had a game where i was playing aram like normal, i realised that the other four were in a premade and they decided to all hide in bush cause the enemy were playing like bots, because i didnt do the same and do exactly as they told me to the started flaming swearing and everything then when i said i was just playing the game stop with the damn pings ect they went crazy swearing and everything then said all 4 were going to report me, even though i was doing nothing wrong. when they said dont push i stop and just ran around our minions but they continued with the flaming till i muted them, i kept playing and was even haling them ect just with them muted
but now do i need to be worried about being punished by riot from their reports even though they were the ones flaming? are solo players protected from premades bullying us? any advice?

Nobody gives a fuck about super duper great sportsmanship. Encouraging the top end of the bellcurve of behaviour to get better does absolutely nothing about the toxic bottom 10% ruining everyone's day. Can we get a functional tribunal, actual bans rather than just chat restrictions, and some  attention to addressing toxicity in a direct manner that isn't just bullshit buzzwords. An RP giveaway doesn't stop the 13 year old riven who just died 3 times blaming the jungler and afking.
